48.eng-name: The Book Pertaining to the Remembrance of Allah, Supplication, Repentance and Seeking Forgiveness

hadiths.text: This hadith had been transmitted on the authority of Anas through another chain of narrators

chapter.ara-name: باب كَرَاهَةِ الدُّعَاءِ بِتَعْجِيلِ الْعُقُوبَةِ فِي الدُّنْيَا
chapter.eng-name: It Is Disliked To Pray For Punishment To Be Brought Forward In This World
